text: Bharat Raj Upreti (; 8 July 1950 - 24 May 2015) was a Nepalese judge. He was a justice of the Supreme Court of Nepal from 22 January 2009 until his resignation in 2013. ==Personal Life== Upreti was born in Sindhupalchowk to a Hindu family. He studied at universities in Nepal and India. ==Death== Upreti died on 24 May 2015 in Gyaneshwor, Kathmandu, aged 64. He committed suicide by hanging. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Nepalese Hindus Category:Judges Category:Suicides by hanging
title: Bharat Raj Upreti
